Detailed Description

This abstract class represents the concept of training algorithm for the multilayer perceptron. Any derived class must implement the train(void), print(void) and save(char*) methods.

See also:
ObjectiveFunctional.

Definition at line 33 of file TrainingAlgorithm.h.

void Flood::TrainingAlgorithm::setGradientHistory ( Matrix< double >  newGradientHistory  ) 

This method sets a new gradient history matrix over the training epochs. The number of rows must be equal to the training size. The number of columns must be equal to the number of free parameters.

Parameters:
newGradientHistory Gradient history matrix.

virtual void Flood::TrainingAlgorithm::train ( void   )  [pure virtual]

This method trains a multilayer perceptron which has a objective functional associated.

Implemented in Flood::ConjugateGradient, Flood::EvolutionaryAlgorithm, Flood::GradientDescent, Flood::NewtonMethod, Flood::QuasiNewtonMethod, and Flood::RandomSearch.
